definitions: a sudden brief appearance of the full sun from behind clouds.
shortDefinitions: sudden brief appearance of full sun from behind clouds

definitions: a decoration or ornament resembling the sun and its rays

examples.text: a pair of sunburst diamond earrings

shortDefinitions: decoration or ornament resembling sun and its rays

definitions: a pattern of irregular concentric bands of color with the brightest at the center

examples.text: the guitar body is finished in a delicately sprayed sunburst

shortDefinitions: pattern of irregular concentric bands of colour with brightest at centre
